partintro.para: Welcome to Zauber Commons! In this part of the reference guide we will explore everything you need to know in order to use Zauber Commons effectively. We've designed this part so that you can read each chapter consecutively and stop at any time. However, the more you read, the more you'll learn and the easier you'll find it to work with Zauber Commons.
Parts II, III and IV of this manual are more designed for reference usage and people who wish to extend Zauber Commons itself.

The fourth and final part of the reference guide provides appendices and background information that does not neatly belong within the other parts. The information is intended to be treated as a reference and not read consecutively.
